name: RC Monster Truck VR - Simulator Game
summary: Brace yourself to crush, clash, and dominate in the ultimate VR Monster Truck arena! Step into a fully immersive 360° world where your monster truck goes head-to-head in fierce, metal-crunching battles. Feel the thunder of the engine, smash through opponents, and perform wild stunts in destructible environments - just pure, adrenaline-pumping action brought to life in virtual reality!
